selector.xpath: (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/MD_DataIdentification/extent/EX_Extent/geographicElement//*) or (/metadata/dcTerms/spatial[not(@xsi:type='dcterms:Box')]) or (/metadata/dcTerms/spatial[@xsi:type='dcterms:Box']) or (/*/spatial) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/extent/EX_Extent/geographicElement) or (/*/Spatial/HorizontalSpatialDomain//*) or (/*/VerticalSpatialDomain//*) or (/*/Spatial[SpatialCoverageType='Orbit'] | /*/Spatial[GranuleSpatialRepresentation='ORBIT']) or (/*/OrbitCalculatedSpatialDomains/OrbitCalculatedSpatialDomain//*) or (/DIF/Spatial_Coverage//*) or (/metadata/idinfo/spdom/bounding) or (/eml/*/coverage/geographicCoverage) or (/resource/geoLocations/geoLocation) or (/metadata/idinfo/spdom/bounding) or (/metadata/mercury/Spatial_Extent) or (/metadata/idinfo/spdom/bounding)

dialect.name: ISO 19115 and ISO 19115-2 / ISO 19139 and ISO 19139-2
Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata

Dryad Data Package and Data File Modules

check.name: TemporalExtentPresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Temporal Extent concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept TemporalExtent is present."
if(TemporalExtent is not None and len(str(TemporalExtent)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "TemporalExtent concept is not present"
return False

selector.name: TemporalExtent
selector.xpath: (/*/MD_DataIdentification/extent/EX_Extent/temporalElement/EX_TemporalExtent//*) or (/metadata/dcTerms/temporal) or (/*/temporal) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/extent/EX_Extent/temporalElement/EX_TemporalExtent//*) or (/*/Temporal//*) or (/DIF/Temporal_Coverage//*) or (/metadata/idinfo/timeperd/timeinfo/rngdates) or (/eml/*/coverage/temporalCoverage) or (/metadata/idinfo/timeperd/timeinfo/rngdates) or (/metadata/mercury[mercury:begdate and mercury:enddate]) or (/metadata/idinfo/timeperd/timeinfo/rngdates)

if(SensorShortName is not None and len(str(SensorShortName)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
